Send word across our empires--we must enlist anyone old enough to hold a weapon! We cannot allow such a pitiful victory!Send word across our empires--we must enlist anyone old enough to hold a weapon! We cannot allow such a pitiful victory!
This was already part of my plan.
You want me to train more artillery? I invented artillery!
Of course. Everyone fears the charge of my cavalry!
I see that your troops are stuck. Don't worry! My elite infantry will bail them out.
I do not wish to pay tribute at this time.
Sorry, what did you say? My new cannons are so loud!
Winter has been hard on my troops. You must wait before we can fight again.
What you are asking is simply impossible!
I need time to muster my troops.
Our Trading Posts have been destroyed! How can we acquire saffron now?
What is sweeter than Aztec chocolate? The smell of victory!
These British will not rule our icy seas!
These Dutch have no idea how to prepare a good herring, and it will lead to their defeat!
These French are ready to meet their Waterloo today.
The Germans sold us their soldiers; now we're beating them with their own men!
The Haudenosaunee made promising changes to their arsenal, but it was never a match for mine.
These Ottomans could not keep their gunpowder dry, and that has led to their downfall.
The shipbuilding techniques of the Portuguese will not save them now.
Who fears the Russians? I am the king in the north!
The Lakota never stood a chance against our sturdy Finnhorses.
How do you break the Spanish Tercio? - With a cannonball! Ha-ha-ha!
The Inca were trying to hide in the mountains. They truly underestimated the range of cannons!
The Chinese invented gunpowder, and I showed them how to use it.
The Japanese didn't shy away from a fight, but their honor could not save them from superior weaponry!
No Indian elephant is too big for my cannons!
The Aztec Jaguar warriors with their obsidian blades are worthy foes for my lion-hearted soldiers!
The British have built a professional army and expanded their arsenal. Time to launch an attack!
It's getting serious. The Dutch sold all of their tulips to field more cannons than I can.
The armor of the French cuirassiers gleams in the sun. I shall respond with the light of my cannons!
The Germans must have untold riches to muster such a big army. We should sack their towns!
The Haudenosaunee have quickly mastered the latest military tactics and become a formidable foe.
The Ottoman artillery is loud and numerous, but my gunners can also hit their targets!
The Portuguese outmaneuver us and know how to keep our troops at bay.
The Russians have reformed their army and hold numerical superiority. Follow my lead!
The Lakota army has grown and moves swiftly on the battlefield. There is no time to catch a breath!
The Spanish deploy their forces with excellence, but can they compete with mine?
The Incas are great in number and fierce melee fighters.
The mighty Chinese army is upgrading its weaponry. Let us attack now or they will tip the odds in their favor!
The Japanese Samurai are carving their way through our ranks with their sharp katanas. Impressive.
Cannons on elephants, sword whips and blade arms. The Indians are trying to outsmart us!
Uh... I'm right behind you! It won't be long...
Already? Tell me, how do you manage to develop so quickly?
Don't stay in the first age. Marvelous technologies await us!
You must advance to the next age! Technological advancements will lead to our victory!
Be careful. If your economic production does not grow, nor will your military.
Finally, now we can get started.
This battle is not in my interest, I shall focus my attention elsewhere in my empire.
My camp is under attack! I request your aid so that I can turn this tide!
My name is Gustavus Adolphus. I am destined for greatness!
If you send me your battle plans I can make adjustments that will bring us victory!
A higher difficulty this time? I see that you are finally rising to my level!
Don't think I'll go easy on them just because you lowered the difficulty setting!
Your ferocity is comparable to mine. Let us both overwhelm our enemies with it!
I am grateful to have you by my side again.
I'm glad you understand the value of having me as an ally, rather than as an enemy.
Just give me a shout when you need my help again.
We know this map well, my friend. An excellent advantage.
It wasn't my fault that we lost last time. I trust you're done warming up?
We are a dream team. Let us march all away across the land!
I was forced to pay ransom for my explorer. Such a fall from grace from our proud past...
Consider this a partial repayment of those... ancient debts I owe you.
The cod catch was great this year. Here, share it with me.
In Sweden we season our food with nothing but salt, but we do have lots of it! Here, have some.
My forests are vast and my lumberjacks very efficient. You can have this wood, as a token of our friendship.
With this timber you just might construct an empire as vast as mine!
If we wait much longer, we will lose the advantage of surprise. I must march to battle!
We will win this war by always making the first move. March, men!
I will crush these natives the same way that I crushed the Snapphanes!
Let's see if your invisible hand can stop me from plundering your trade!
With God and the victorious arms, we shall win this fight!
My army needs room to expand. I shall build another military base.
I shall found a new city for the Swedish Empire!
Take this coin. You seem like you need it.
Do you like fish? I can throw you a red herring.
We'll send you some of our finest lumber!
If an ally is in need, Sweden will answer!
I do not do well in peacetime... perhaps we could start just a tiny war?
All of this inaction is making my troops anxious.
My population is too small to support my giant army. Could you spare me some coin?
Winter has been harsh in Sweden. Could you spare us some food?
I used my last wood to build a giant goat and someone burned it down. Could you spare me some of yours?
We'll spend the coin wisely on our technological advancement.
It's no pickled herring, but it will have to do.
Thank you. I will not forget this generous contribution.
After all the times I have carried you, I am happy that you saw fit to pay some of it back.
We'll craft masterful constructions with your wood. Many thanks.
The Aztecs are dominating the battlefield. Today, I have sacrified my honor.
The British have defeated us! We shall not be ruling the waves today.
The Dutch have come to pillage my settlement...again!
I did not expect such fierceness from the French. Today, I shall surrender.
The Germans are furious. Are they still upset about Magdeburg - or is it my name?
The tomahawks of the Haudenosaunee always seem to find their target. Their technique is formidable.
I cannot believe that the Ottomans are running us off... again!
I do not want to become lost in the smoke from the Portuguese cannons. We should pull back.
The Russian army is too big for a pitched battle. We should retreat to fight another day.
The Lakota are pushing back my troops with unmatched perseverance. We should retreat immediately!
The Spanish came for our gold, but we spent it all on this lost war! We should surrender.
Despite our advanced weaponry, the Inca are dominating the battle. We should capitulate.
Let the Chinese be the central kingdom so long as we can keep the north.
United under one banner and with all of their swords facing us, the Japanese fighting prowess is too much to handle.
Camelry and elephants trample my horses... why did I decide to pick a fight with the Indians?
Let us negotiate a truce with the Aztecs, so my botanists can at least take a good look at their floating gardens.
The British are still using archers on the battlefield? It seems that I underestimated this ancient weaponry.
These Dutch took all of our fish! No wonder we have been defeated.
We are no match for the mighty French. An alliance will be in our interests for the next war.
The Germans noticed that the Schwedentrunk doesn't taste like beer. We should break camp - now!
The Haudenosaunee used all of the trees for woodworking! We had nothing left for ourselves.
It appears that the Ottomans brought guns of their own. Who would have thought?
The Portuguese opened fire before my cannons were in position. Retreat!
These Russians brought guns to a snowball fight. No wonder we lost.
The Lakota horses move too swiftly for our gunners. We should return to target practice.
My soldiers underestimated the length of Spanish pikes. Now victory is literally out of reach.
I was a fool for trusting the old adage. These Inca sticks and stones break my bones indeed!
I hate to admit it, but the inventions of the Chinese leave me stumped. How can I fight against this?
I figured that the Japanese would be too busy fighting among themselves to oppose us, but it seems that I was mistaken.
The Indians fight like tigers, and we just became their prey.
It is time for me to fade away. I have lost the game, and no one is to blame... here I go!
We are in the worst game, we are in last place, and you are the worst part of this team. Do you know how bad that makes you!?
My men march with ferocity! Our victory is ensured!
You are tough as leather! You have proven to be a worthy ally to Sweden!
The Lion of the North roars again! You are honoured to have me by your side.
Today we were outsmarted! Let us resign and fight again another day.
A good general recognizes when the battle is lost. Let us resign with honor.
I am longing to go back to Stockholm. Can we stop this bloodshed?
Our enemy lives a life of wealth through trade. If we let them continue like this, it will put my treasury to shame.
Many of the natives have been rallied to oppose us. Such auxiliaries benefit our enemy far too well.
I hope that we can find many treasures in this new world.
Is that the most exotic find that this place has to offer?
Spend that food wisely. An army cannot march on an empty stomach!
Don't tell me that you will be ignoring the war to pursue your treasure hunting obsession?
That discovery was in my territory! Keep to your own lands!
You may recruit help from the locals if you so wish.
A passable demonstration of kindness. At least you made the settlers happy.
As exotic that wood might be, will the houses you build with them be as beautiful as mine?
I have claimed a treasure! Soon, my future vision will be reality.
As soon as these coins are polished, they will be fit for my coffers!
Enough food for seconds at my banquet!
I figured that you were not interested in keeping that for yourself.
I'm quite enjoying this treasure hunt.
An extra pair of helping hands from those who know the land better than us.
My daring expedition to rescue these settlers was a success!
I wonder how many Dalecarlian horses I can carve with this wood?
I did not build this wall because I cannot stand the outside world. I just need a break from it.
Wealth is imminent! Tonight we shall feast as our forefathers did.
So, you have chosen the coward's way to to victory? It will cost you dearly!
A king, warlord, and businessman. That's me!
You may have new tools at hand, but do you have anyone to use them?
You... do know how to age up, right?
Are you still an age behind? Your mother would be so ashamed of you!
You have advanced to the next age? We will be there shortly and outshine your technological advances!
Well, you can't place first every time... or ever, in your case.
Aaaand in last place we have... you! Congratulations!
Are you building a vacation cabin for yourself over there?
I could not imagine wanting to live so close to your neighbor.
I am Gustavus Adolphus, the Lion of the North. Today you will hear me roar!
You think that last time was hard? It was a mere military exercise!
You think that this will be easier? War is never easy!
I recognize this part of the woods! I used to defeat my foes here.
The Swedish Empire is small, yet you bring all of these allies? We shall meet on the battlefield!
Through my guidance, my alliance will crush your empire!
You come to look for a king?
I see that you have assembled your army. Maybe you can pick off a moose or two with it.
What is your retinue doing here? Oh, is this your army? Could have fooled me.
Aahh! My cannonballs will turn your army into meatballs!
I have faced far worse odds than this!
My base is going up in flames like my beloved Vasa! Vengeance will be mine!
This is the force that you send to fight the Swedish Empire? You insult me!
This is your base? How very... quaint.
This is quite nice, don't you think? Why don't you delete those troops of yours? Surely you don't need them in such... peaceful times?
We shall fight again another day, but for now, I request to resign.
A great general recognizes defeat. May I offer my surrender?
Just a minor dent in my plan.
Oh, you found your first treasure. How cute.
Keep scouting for knick-knacks. They won't help you against my mighty army!
You found some gold? It's worth nothing in the hands of incapable leaders.
That's probably all the food that you need to feed your pitiful army.
Sure, pick up all of these scraps. It won't help you face my military might!
You sure are greedy, but it won't help you!
A whole new world to explore, and you choose to steal from me? Pathetic!
Those natives will not be happy to have been taken under your wing once the nest is on fire.
Your workforce has scattered through the wilderness, so now you must herd them back like sheep?
I deserved that wood. My woodworking is much more skillful than yours.
Walls? I'll blast right through them!
The locals fight with me! Clearly, they recognize who is superior.
The locals know who has the best goods for trading!
This gold will pave the way for Swedish supremacy in these new lands!
I would kill for some fresh Swedish fish...
These resources are best used in capable hands. Let me help you with this.
Unlike yours, my explorer is efficient in finding new treasures.
The natives will repay that favor by bringing me your head.
I can see it in these settlers' eyes - they are relieved to be working for me rather than for you.
More workers for the Swedish Empire!
With this wood I shall build a Torp.
You feel the need to drag natives into our war? So be it.
The locals are trading with you only because they haven't met me yet.
A true general fights on the battlefield, but whatever floats your boat.

<color=1.0, 1.0, 0.0>Civilization bonus:</color>
Torps gather nearby resources. Jaeger and Black Rider mercenaries can always be recruited from the Tavern. Mercenary shipments are cheaper and arrive more quickly. Advanced improvements available at the Arsenal.
<color=1.0, 1.0, 0.0>Royal guard units:</color>Pikeman (Dalkarl) and Hakkapelit (Drabant)
<color=1.0, 1.0, 0.0>Unique units:</color>
Carolean, Leather Cannon and Hakkapelit

The Swedish Empire became one of the greatest in Europe through innovation in military tactics and logistics. Its artillery and cavalry charges dominated the battlefields, particularly during the Thirty Years War. Despite a relatively small population, the Swedes fielded some of the largest armies in Europe, partly through the recruitment of mercenaries.

Gustavus Adolphus is a cunning and aggressive tactician. He strives for superior military technology and likes to attack early. Gustavus prefers to engage the enemy in close combat and dominate the battlefield with the barrage of his artillery.
Swedish Musketeer that fires quickly and counters cavalry from range. Can charge quickly with his sword equipped. Good in melee combat.
Supports 10 population and gathers nearby resources.
Swedish House that supports 10 population and gathers nearby resources. Spawns a small Berry Bush.
Fast heavy hand cavalry from Finland with a powerful short ranged attack.
Hakkapelit attack and hitpoints greatly increased.
Heavy cavalry mercenary with a powerful short ranged attack.
Guard upgrades for Crossbowmen and Hand Infantry can be researched very cheaply
Mercenary and Outlaw hitpoints and attack greatly increased
Enables Hot Air Balloon ability for Explorers

Transforms into a Military Building which can train units.
Guard upgrades for Longbowmen and Pikemen can be researched very cheaply
Torps can’t be built too closely together.
You can't build a Torp too close to other buildings
Light affordable artillery that can fire and reposition quickly. Good against infantry.

<color=1.0, 1.0, 0.0>Civilization bonus:</color>
Federal states unlock two new cards per age and two Factory cards in Industrial Age. Receives XP crates for free when aging up. Generals can build Forts instead of Town Centers. Levies can be called repeatedly from multiple buildings.
<color=1.0, 1.0, 0.0>National guard units:</color>State Militia (Volunteer)
<color=1.0, 1.0, 0.0>Unique units:</color>
Carbine Cavalry, Gatling Gun, Ironclad, Minuteman, Regular, Sharpshooter, Sloop, State Militia, Steamer

The "land of opportunity" provided a new world for people from many nations, creating the famous melting pot of cultures. Expanding from militia forces skilled in skirmishing tactics and marksmanship to a professional army, the United States of America ensured its independence and impressive road to prosperity.

George Washington is a charismatic and resourceful statesman. As leader of the land of opportunity, he uses a wide range of tactics and will not be easily outwitted. Whether through military might, raw economic output, or technological advancement, he will seize any advantage that he sees.
Skirmisher with low range that sacrifices attack for hitpoints. Gains additional hitpoints in groups.
Skirmisher with a long-ranged attack, but low hitpoints. Gains extra range per upgrade. Good against infantry.
Heavy ranged infantry with greater range than other Musketeers. Armed with a bayonet to beat cavalry.
Ranged light cavalry equipped with a carbine repeater. Good against Heavy Cavalry and Artillery.
Sloop. Small and nimble warship. Good at exploring, fishing or transport.
Steamer. Powerful, steam-propelled warship resistant to building fire that can train units, construct docks and gather fish.
Decoy unit which deals no damage but can take the shape of any common artillery. Good to distract the enemy and to attract enemy fire.
State Militia attack and hitpoints increased.
Carbine Cavalry attack and hitpoints increased.
Levy: Call a handful of Minutemen to defend this town!
You cannot call upon Minutemen right now.
Quick-training, Minuteman who quickly loses hitpoints, becoming less effective over time.
Immigration from the British Isles enables Settlers to slowly be trained from Houses.
Venture capitalists from the Netherlands enable you to establish a Bank. Mines last longer and can be gathered slightly faster.
The hero of your civilization. Explores, fights, builds Forts and Trading Posts. Cannot die. If he falls unconscious, he can be rescued.
Gatling Gun attack and hitpoints increased.
Select a building from which to call Minutemen

Wagon training and powerful improvements for your civilization.

United States infantry and cavalry are trained faster.
Healers have increased speed and hitpoints. Field Hospitals have increased hitpoints and are built faster.
Gatling Guns no longer need to reload, so fire continuously.
Artillery captured and operated by Native Americans. Can also inflict splash damage to enemy land units. Good against buildings and ships.
Venture capitalists from the Netherlands enable you to establish a Bank. Mines last longer.
German immigrants settle down in Germantown, causing each existing and newly constructed Mill to spawn 1 Settler Wagon. In the Industrial Age you can recruit Settler Wagons from Mills as well.
The Russian-American Company supplies 2 Blockhouse Wagons and enables your Villagers to gather food from huntable animals faster.
Bank Wagon: Can be reacquired from State Capitol

Ships 1 Outpost Wagon. Spanish immigration boosts XP income, allowing you to earn shipments considerably faster. Upon reaching the Commerce Age, the "Levy" ability can also be used to call groups of powerful Pikemen.\n • The Pikemen do not lose hitpoints.
Patrol: Dispatch a handful of Pikemen to chase away enemy cavalry!
You cannot call upon a Patrol right now.
Charged Ability: Fires a single, well-placed carbine shot at higher range.
Charged Ability: A heavy strike dealing area damage.

Plants the United States flag to boost morale! Nearby military units and buildings inflict more damage and are created faster. Flags cannot be planted near starting Town Centers, and only one flag can be planted at a time.
Boosts the morale of nearby United States units and must be defended! If captured by enemies, it will be removed from the map.

Tactically planted by a General to boost nearby United States units and buildings. If no allied units or buildings are nearby, it can be captured by enemies and removed from the map.
 • Grants +10% Attack Damage to all Units.
 • Grants +10% Attack Damage to all Buildings.

 • Grants +50% Construction speed to all Buildings.
The flag cannot be planted nearby a starting Town Center.

Powerful, defensive building that can train United States military units.

An Outpost which can also train United States units
Combination of Barracks and Outpost. Can defend the frontier and train infantry. Also provides 10 population.
Irish immigration delivers 2 Settlers and 2 additional Settlers for every 5 minutes of game time passed (up to a maximum of 30 minutes).
You cannot levy another Trading Post Rickshaw until the "Levy" ability has recharged.
Chinese immigration delivers 1 Trading Post Rickshaw and enables the "Levy" ability to be used at Trading Posts to recruit more Trading Post Rickshaws for free. Trading Post hitpoints increased.
Small but mighty field gun with an additional case shot attack. Moves and fires quickly.
Hulk. Advanced armored warship which sometimes takes no damage from incoming attacks
